title: Residential Manager/Group Home Supervisor
description: Job Description Job Description Job Summary The role of a Residential Manager is to lead and oversee the operation and management of assigned site homes. The Residential Manager supervises direct support staff and directly work with individuals with intellectual disabilities to support them to become independent, empowered, make choices, decisions, and live meaningful dignified life with valued social roles. title: Supports Coordinator - Case Manager Social Services - Easton, PA
description: About Us Care Lync is a Social Services agency focused on providing Support Coordination (Service Coordination/Case Management) services to adults diagnosed with Intellectual, Developmental and Physical Disabilities and Autism Spectrum Disorder throughout Pennsylvania who are enrolled in the Department of Human Services, Medicaid Waiver Program.
